title: I cannot enter a game for 2 days now
body: Every time I try to play a game  the loading page with the heroes does not load staying 0% and it keeps not responding and when I try to reconnect it does the same thing and I am never able to access the game. Sometimes when I close and reopen the client the reconnect button does not appear and it keeps saying "Game is still in progress". I want help please.

replies.body: This can happen when your connection is specifically struggling to reach the game server.  See if [Port Forwarding a](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)s well as firewall configuration via the HRT can help in these cases.  Test it in a custom game, though!
